Thanks for the awesome torrent, but how do i change the name?
To change the name go to the folder you extracted->Binaries->Win32 and open 3DMGame in Notepad. Change "PlayerName =Jason" to whatever you want and save.
Hey readyman, I'm having a problem very similar to Will. the dll file I have missing is 'XINPUT1_3.dll'. Do I use the same link?

GFWL Link:
http://www.freewarefiles.com/Microsoft-Games-For-Windows-LIVE_program_35222.html

DLL Link:
xinput1_3.dll free download - DLL-files.comwww.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?xinput1_3

Hope this helps.

Truely the same great work you've ever done. Fast loading. If you need more Gold keys, just change the log ( Borderlands 2>DLC>POPremierclub>Lic>WillowDLC>[GoldenKeys]
+SourceId=253
+NumKeys=999

also for multi char accounts, when you run out of keys just change log back

[GoldenKeys]
+SourceId=254
+NumKeys=999

Notice the 254  (just change that number back and forth 254 to 253 to 254. Every time you do you should have a new sum of keys,( over 200 )

This is not to be done on legal copies, I am not responsible for anything that happens to your property. Always back up your saves, before making any changes. In log

Documents>mygames>Borderlands 2>WillowGame>Savedata. Make copy of entire file to your desktop
